item.title: Prioritizing celery tasks with different queues
item.description: When you have working SQL query there might not be so simple and straightforward itâ€™s migration to Presto SQL. Recently I had a job to extract data from one table but with multiple added columns which requires sub-select. To demonstrate the problem and solution I have prepared simple user and location table where location entry represents where and where have users moved. Celery supports prioritization within each queue, but what if you want to reserve premium resource allocations for some tasks?
